actions.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Massie to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Massie to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment allows the GSA to construct, install, and operate electric car charging stations on federal properties for use by employees. Such construction, installation, and operation would be funded solely through user fees.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to allow the GSA to construct, install, and operate electric car charging stations on federal properties for use by employees. The construction, installation, and operation will be funded solely through user fees, so taxpayers will incur no cost.
